title: Cilantro & Olive Salsa Suggestions
suggestions: Spoon warmed salsa over hot pasta or rice
Stir into macaroni and cheese or Alfredo sauce
Excellent on omelets or scrambled eggs
For creamy dip, stir in sour cream to taste
Make it spicier with a sprinkle of Fiesta Party Dip Mix
Excellent served with Mango Breeze Margaritas or Samba Sangria Slush
